case.name: Ran away from men
case.description: Florina has run away from the room after losing for the first time, but only if there is a man present (she's terrified of men)

case.name: Attempted to flee
case.description: When Florina has to remove her tunic, she tries to run away, but Lyn stops her

trigger.state: Come on, Florina. You can't always run off like that.
Stick around, Florina. I know you can do it.

case.name: Bee attack 1
case.description: A bee flies in front of Florina, causing her to panic and rip off her tunic to shoo it away.

trigger.state: S-s-somebody, get it off! Get it off me!

case.name: Bee attack 2
case.description: The bee makes a return, and Florina pulls off her bra in a panic.

case.name: Singing finish
case.description: Florina is singing a song to herself while masturbating to distract herself from what she's doing in front of everyone

trigger.state: Um...I think I'm singing it too fast.
Now what? I'm going to outlast my song.
Wait, the song is almost done but I'm not. I'd better slow down...

case.name: Butt pose
case.description: Florina just took off her panties facing backwards, and will play the next hand like that.

trigger.state: I th-think I'm just going to face this way from now on.
You don't mind if I play backwards, do you?
Phew, I did it. But... my b-butt, huh.
I'm trying to decide if this makes it easier or if I'm just sticking out even more.
I actually stripped n-naked in front of everyone. Fiora is going to f-flip...
Um, you don't mind if I st-stay turned around. W-wait, what if they're staring at my b-butt? I can't tell!
Okay, just p-play without me. I think I'll stay like this for awhile....
